about_the_game: A kid today is defined by their hydration drink – and their swag. Impress your friends and show the world how much CRED you have. The CRED Cosmetics pack gives you plenty of cred with a fresh hairstyle, a CRED hoodie, and a cape.

content_descriptors.notes: Frequent depiction of fart clouds, feces, urine and other gross ways to use against enemies.

detailed_description:
This DLC is included here:

SOUTH PARK: SNOW DAY! - Season Pass


About the Game

A kid today is defined by their hydration drink – and their swag. Impress your friends and show the world how much CRED you have. The CRED Cosmetics pack gives you plenty of cred with a fresh hairstyle, a CRED hoodie, and a cape.
